vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.16.34;
son of: Hiel (H2419);
brother of: Abiram (H0048H)
§ Segub = "exalted"
1) the youngest son of Hiel the Bethelite who rebuilt Jericho
2) a Judaite, son of Hezron
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Hiel, reconstructor de Jericó; (b)   hijo de Hesrón; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西割 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "被高舉的"
1) 重建耶利哥城的伯特利人希伊勒的么子 #王上 16:34|
2) 猶大人希斯崙的兒子之一
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
西割 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "被高举的"
1) 重建耶利哥城的伯特利人希伊勒的么子 #王上 16:34|
2) 犹大人希斯仑的儿子之一

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.21;
son of: Hezron (H2696H) and the daughter_of_Machir (H4353I);
half-brother of: Ram (H7410), Jerahmeel (H3396), Caleb (H3612H) and Ashhur (H0806);
father of: Jair (H2971)
§ Segub = "exalted"
1) the youngest son of Hiel the Bethelite who rebuilt Jericho
2) a Judaite, son of Hezron
